name: cbval
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1

body.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wal(s1, w1), wal(s0, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wal(s1, w1), wal(s0, w0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wal(s1, w1), wal(s0, w0))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w0, w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wi(wal(s1, w1), wal(s0, w0))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s1, w1), wal(s0, w0))
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wi(w1, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wi(w1, w0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wi(w1, w0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w1, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w1, w0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w1, w0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wal(s0, w0), wal(s1, w1))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wnf(s0, w1)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))

comment: Rule used to change bound variables, using implicit substitution. See ~ cbvalv , ~ cbvalv1 , and ~ cbvalvw for weaker versions using fewer axioms. (Contributed by NM, 13-May-1993.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-Oct-2016.)
